Articles.Content:
In this game, you rate (and try to guess) the quote above you.

Rules:

1. No chatting, stay on topic.

2. Obey all Forum Rules. (duh)

Example.

> 
> "That's inconceivable!"

> 
> 10/10 Princess Bride FTW!
> "You keep using that word, I do not think it means what you think it means"

I will begin.

"Never get involved in a land war in Asia."

1/10 America, thats why. and who did it... uhh, i have no clue

"To become the Kerbal, one must first, explode the Kerbal."

3/10 1 too many commas.

"Whether or not you choose to look at the path you're on, at least remember that it exists, for as long as you focus on the light at the end of the tunnel, it becomes all of your world."

7/10 Sounds like poetry.

"...Has learned how not to be seen."
